Issue.summary: As a Fabric CLI user, I expect all commands to print their status on screen
Issue.description: INFO 001 Using default escc 2018-07-28 13:43:44.929 UTC chaincodeCmd checkChaincodeCmdParams -> INFO 002 Using default vscc {noformat} Or consider the case where they wish to sign a transaction (using peer channl signconfigtx): {noformat} 2018-07-28 14:06:22.880 UTC channelCmd InitCmdFactory -> INFO 001 Endorser and orderer connections initialized {noformat} There is no information in either of these cases to let the users know whether the operation succeeded or not. h2. How to fix this? Add a log level message (INFO for success, ERROR for error) that prints the status of the operation. >
